authors: Alicia Vrajlal For Daily Mail Australia
description: Taking to Instagram, the 21-year-old Australian drummer shared a photo of himself getting inked, though was cheeky enough not to reveal the completed design.
title: 5 Seconds of Summer's Ashton Irwin gets a brand new tattoo
title_page: 5 Seconds of Summer's Ashton Irwin gets a brand new tattoo | Daily Mail Online
text:
He and his 5 Seconds Of Summer bandmates are no strangers to body art, so it was no surprise to see Ashton Irwin making a trip to the tattoo parlour on Wednesday.
Taking to Instagram, the 21-year-old Australian drummer shared a photo of himself getting inked, though was cheeky enough not to reveal the completed design.
Wearing a black T-shirt and matching trousers, the curly-haired star was seen looking away as a tattoo artist attended to his left arm.
Scroll down for video
Tatt's cool! Ashton Irwin took to Instagram on Wednesday to share a snap of himself getting a new tattoo
It looks like the tattoo will complement the existing inked design he has scrawled across his right wrist already.
Ashton appears to be currently dating model Bryana Holly.
After months of being spotted in public together, Ashton finally confirmed their romance during an interview with Rolling Stone magazine last year.
Already inked: It looks like the tattoo will complement the existing inked design he has scrawled across his right wrist already
At the time he said 'I went into the desert with my girlfriend at the time for two days or something...and I was like '"Okay, I have to be back by Monday morning because I have a writing session at John's".'
Five months later he revealed that he was in fact single again due to a hectic work schedule which saw him travelling the globe.
While speaking to legendary radio host Howard Stern, the band member said: 'I actually tried to have a relationship and it just didn't work out.'
Loved up: Ashton appears to be dating American model Bryana Holly
Bryana recently sent fans spiralling into a frenzy, this time sparking speculation she may be headed down the aisle.
Taking to Instagram on Friday, the 22-year-old model shared a photo of herself in a white bridal gown and veil, immediately attracting an abundance of comments from fans enquiring if she was set to wed Ashton.
Bryana arrived in Sydney in mid-December to celebrate Christmas with 5 Seconds Of Summer's Ashton before jetting off to Bali with him and the band.
